metadata.description: Binary flag mapping for Phase 2 data quality issues

flag_mapping.1: Contradictory values found in Window Seat and Aisle Seat columns.
flag_mapping.2: Status vs operational data conflict detected.
flag_mapping.8: Negative or impossible numeric values detected.

1.description: Contradictory values found in Window Seat and Aisle Seat columns.
1.fix_approach: Ensure only one of Window Seat or Aisle Seat is True per row.

2.description: Status vs operational data conflict detected.
2.fix_approach: Review and resolve discrepancies between Status and operational timestamps.

4.fix_approach: Ensure departure datetime is before arrival datetime.

8.description: Negative or impossible numeric values detected.
8.fix_approach: InvestiGate and correct negative or unrealistic duration values.
